attributes.action: introduce of feed-in tariffs to encourage the uptake of small scale renewable energy generation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: FIT laws place a legal obligation on utilities to purchase electricity from renewable energy installations. The tariff rate is guaranteed, and in the best examples, for a long period -- say 20 years. The tariff rate is scientifically determined for each technology, to ensure profitable operation of the installation.
